main event: A ball of fire with three red lights was observed in Wood Glen, New Jersey on 15 November 1967.
interesting points: The observation lasted for approximately 10 minutes., The object appeared to be stationary before moving west., The object emitted an appearance of fire on the horizon., The sighting was part of the USAF's Project Blue Book program., Conclusive data was deemed insufficient for further evaluation.
sighted object: ball of fire with three red lights
witness description: no witnesses were confirmed in the report
